section basic hot water bottle cover | emma ward idleemma pattern 1 chain 37 starting in 2nd chain from hook double_crochet across 36 sts 2 turn your work so that you can crochet into the other side of your starting chain 3 work double_crochet along chain until the end 36 sts on this side 72 sts in total 4 at this point you have two ways you can continue crocheting the body of your hot water bottle ● if you prefer to work in rounds *slip_stitch into the first st chain 1 doesn t count as st and double_crochet around* repeat for however many rounds until you ve reached the required length this method is best if you re doing stripes or working a design into your cover ● if you prefer working in a spiral like you do in amigurumi don t slip_stitch into your first st instead work a double_crochet into it and continue working double_crochet around until you reach the required length this method works well for solid colours or self striping yarn 5 if your bottle is about the
